name: unamusing
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not funny: The seemingly never-ending saga of his injured foot was tiresome and unamusing. He whacks bystanders with a balloon and cracks elaborately unamusing jokes.
More examplesFewer examplesThis new TV sitcom is flat and distinctly unamusing.The novel comprises a series of observations that, while not unamusing, reveal a sour and embittered narrative eye.Stallone is not unamusing as the toymaker, and Clooney is hilarious in his role as the president.The stunt was a particularly unamusing error of judgment.
